【Now Sports-體育】車路士前鋒艾巴咸表示，曾為球隊季前的跑步操練感到不滿，不過現在終於明白這是領隊林柏特用心良苦的安排。

艾巴咸（Tammy Abraham）憶述車路士的季前操練安排時說：「我認為隊內不少球員，都因為季前操練加重跑步練習而感到不快，但現在一切都明白了，並理解為何有著一個艱苦的季前操練。」

「領隊（林柏特）來到，他告訴我們球隊應該要有怎樣的比賽風格、要如何爭勝，與及如何壓逼對手。我最初未能做到，因為我體力未夠，但球季開始至今我經已習慣。現在己隊已清楚他的所想，目標就是要讓對方後衛沒有時間控球，讓他們疲於奔命。」

車路士近期在所有賽事中已連勝4場，艾巴咸承認這正是球隊季前刻苦訓練所得的成果。而在英超連勝兩場後，車路士現時已在積分榜攀升至第5位，落後前領的利物浦10分。

艾巴咸（Tammy Abraham）憶述車路士的季前操練安排時說：「我認為隊內不少球員，都因為季前操練加重跑步練習而感到不快，但現在一切都明白了，並理解為何有著一個艱苦的季前操練。」

「領隊（林柏特）來到，他告訴我們球隊應該要有怎樣的比賽風格、要如何爭勝，與及如何壓逼對手。我最初未能做到，因為我體力未夠，但球季開始至今我經已習慣。現在己隊已清楚他的所想，目標就是要讓對方後衛沒有時間控球，讓他們疲於奔命。」

車路士近期在所有賽事中已連勝4場，艾巴咸承認這正是球隊季前刻苦訓練所得的成果。而在英超連勝兩場後，車路士現時已在積分榜攀升至第5位，落後前領的利物浦10分。
應該係因為咁所以雷狗先想走

依加足球就係要跑跑跑
越跑得多越易贏波

【Now Sports-體育】翼鋒韋利安跟車路士的合約在今季後便完結，雙方雖仍未傾續約，但這名巴西國腳已表明留隊的意願。

韋利安（Willian）近年一直盛傳會離開車路士，加盟巴塞隆拿或曼聯，但未有成事。今季新帥林柏特入主後，亦曾有報道指韋利安會被棄用，不過後者仍然企穩正選，上仗更達到於車仔的300場里程碑。

「我一直相信自己可以踢這樣多比賽。達到這個數字真的很困難，特別是身在車路士這樣的大球會，因為有太多球員爭位了，是一個巨大的挑戰。」31歲的韋利安說。

韋利安於2013年從薩克達來投，至今已經效力了6年，「我經歷了不同領隊、隊友，在每課操練都努力證明自己。我於車路士進步良多，每場比賽都會自省。我很驕傲獲得這個數字，希望可以再踢300場。」

【Now Sports-體育】射手基奧特今季於車路士不受重用，直言有機會離隊。

車路士領隊林柏特重用小將，單箭頭位置偏好使用艾巴咸，後者亦的確踢得出色，令33歲的基奧特（Olivier Giroud）至今只曾3次於英超披甲，僅1次擔正；事實上，基奧特加盟後經歷3名主帥，從未被視為首選。

「我將會搏命爭取車路士的席位，領隊也知道。我們將會在1月做決定。」雖然於球會失意，但基奧特狀態仍出色，剛為法國於連續2場歐國盃外圍賽建功。

基奧特續說：「我想不想離開車路士？不想。如果我要作出選擇的話……我還有數個美好年頭，現在33歲，仍有雙腿及健康生活模式，體能非常好，我希望踢多點比賽。車路士是我的首選，但如果有需要，會像當年離開阿仙奴一樣。」

Manchester United’s Juan Mata opened up about how it felt to be a Chelsea player once.

The Spaniard signed for Chelsea in 2011 and ended up leaving in 2014 after falling out of favour under Jose Mourinho.

Mata managed to excite the Blues fans with his mesmerizing control of the ball and creative abilities, the form he could never match up post his Stamford Bridge departure.

“It was an incredible time for me, I arrived from Valencia, it was a new chapter in my career, a new life, a new country, a new language. But everything was very good from the beginning,” he said.

“I remember my first game against Norwich at home, I had one chance and I scored and since then I enjoyed many great moments winning important trophies in two years.

“The fans were incredible to me in both years, voting for me as player of the season, so all my memories from London and from Chelsea are great, and I am very grateful and I will always be.”

Chelsea supporters still view Mata as the one that got away. If it were not for Mourinho and his strict defensive regime, we could have seen more of Juan Mata and Eden Hazard pairing up to completely dismantle opposition defences for a few more years.

講佐狗12m

Former Blues goalkeeper Matej Delac used to test his penalty-saving skills against Eden Hazard in training and he sees similarities between the Belgian's strategy and that of Jorginho.

"It was very difficult against Hazard," he tells Goal . "At the last moment, he used to look at the goalkeeper. He waited for the goalkeeper before taking the last step. It was the same as Jorginho is doing now at Chelsea.

"Most goalkeepers will make a movement already ahead of his step. In that split-second, the penalty-taker will have the time he needs to choose the right side.

"This movement Jorginho makes looks funny but it stops him from missing. It is a good technique for him but it's a difficult one to master.

"It is down to the pure quality of the player because not everybody has that calmness to take a penalty like that. He just chooses the side at the last second. I find it difficult to guess which he's going to go.

"If you stay in the middle until the last moment, then he can easily put it in the corner because of the distance. You have that mental game with him.

"But there's no doubt that he is now the man at Chelsea. He is the best penalty-taker they have."

Former Blues goalkeeper Matej Delac used to test his penalty-saving skills against Eden Hazard in training and he sees similarities between the Belgian's strategy and that of Jorginho.

"It was very difficult against Hazard," he tells Goal . "At the last moment, he used to look at the goalkeeper. He waited for the goalkeeper before taking the last step. It was the same as Jorginho is doing now at Chelsea.

"Most goalkeepers will make a movement already ahead of his step. In that split-second, the penalty-taker will have the time he needs to choose the right side.

"This movement Jorginho makes looks funny but it stops him from missing. It is a good technique for him but it's a difficult one to master.

"It is down to the pure quality of the player because not everybody has that calmness to take a penalty like that. He just chooses the side at the last second. I find it difficult to guess which he's going to go.

"If you stay in the middle until the last moment, then he can easily put it in the corner because of the distance. You have that mental game with him.

"But there's no doubt that he is now the man at Chelsea. He is the best penalty-taker they have."

To take account of passing contributions that aren’t credited with an assist or a ‘key pass’, a worthwhile exercise is counting the ‘shot-ending sequence involvements’, to use Opta’s definition, of each player.
(Note that this list of shot involvements includes the most important contribution: the player who had the shot itself.)

"end up係射門"嘅play嘅參與度：



But this list is arguably too dominated by attacking players, especially if we want to find those who start moves from deep. So the list of build-up contributions alone — ignoring shots and key passes — shows Jorginho and Stephens at the top of the list. Harry Winks, who is a classic ‘safe’ passing midfielder, with no assists this season, is also prominent, while it’s notable that Chelsea’s Cesar Azpilicueta is the only non-midfielder on the list.

任何build up參與度：


It’s also worthwhile looking at the players who actually start the sequences that end in goals. Alexander-Arnold and De Bruyne are yet again prominent this season but Jorginho is way out in front here, showing the value of a player like him in that deep midfield role, capable of receiving the ball in tight situations and playing intelligent, measured passes to team-mates.
